wikipedia_page.main: John Lapsley (born 24 November 1951) is a Scottish former footballer, who played for several Scottish Football League clubs in the 1970s and 1980s. Most of his league appearances were made with Airdrieonians, who he played for in  the 1975 Scottish Cup Final.

response: thumb|The grave of John Lapsley in the churchyard of St Mary's, Benhall
*John Lapsley KBE, CB, DFC, AFC, RAF (1916–1995), World War II fighter pilot; later a senior Royal Air Force commander
